```{r}

f <- function(x){
  result <- x^3+x^2-6
  return(result)
}

```


```{r}

g <- function(a, b){
  result <- a*b*(b-a)
  return(result)
}

```


```{r}

h <- function(m, n){
  result <- sqrt(m/n)+m-2*n
  return(result)
}

```
